oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Cossitt Library Exterior
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: “Cossitt Library, Memphis Public Library System -- 33 South Front -- Cossitt Library houses the reference and research collection of the Memphis public library system, and also the downtown circulating library. Three miles east of the business district is the Main Library, at McClean and Peabody. Seven branch libraries serve the residential areas. More than a half million volumes are available. Special departments are offered for business, science, industry, genealogy, and music.”
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Cossitt Library; libraries; education; downtown;
oai_dc:dc.dc:publisher: Bluff City News Co., Memphis, Tenn.
